resources:
MusicBee Remote When pressed it toggles the volume mute. When pressed it changes the repeat (all/none). When pressed it changes the shuffle mode (on/off). When pressed it plays the previous track When pressed either it starts playing a track or pauses it if it is already playing. When pressed it plays the next track. It displays the album cover for the current track. Settings Connection Settings Miscellaneous incoming_call_action Incoming call action Default action on incoming call 

Requires permission to read the Phone State. This service is responsible for the communication of the application with the plugin. Remote Control Application for MusicBee Share About MusicBee Remote MusicBee Remote Version The valid port range is from 1 to 65535 Search open_source Offline Authenticating Connected Computer name Hostname / IP Port number Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Artistname SCAN ADD Add Represents if this connection is the default selected connection Set default Edit Delete v%1$s Open source licenses settings_version manage_connections This service is available only on a wifi connection A remote service could not be found Service successfully found mbrc.library_track_default Manage Connections Library Track Action What should happen when you press on a track entry in the library. now last_update_check License mbrc_license Help & Feedback last_version_run Exit build_time_key revision_key Open source licenses MusicBee Remote license Used as an anchor for drag and drop Should be shown if the track is currently playing Home Now playing Lyrics Queue Last Queue Next Get Album Tracks Play Now Get Albums Get Artists Last.fm Scrobbling Love Rate the playing track How you feel about the application? Feedback Send Feedback Feedback Help MusicBeeRemote InApp Feedback Send feedback using… Plugin Update Check Periodically check for updated versions of the plugin plugin_update_check - More options Options none Playlists Library [Empty] Unknown artist Search your library Genres Artists Albums Tracks Sorry could not find any results for your search! Connect Button Previous Play/Pause Nextdw Computer icon Edit Save Non album tracks No lyrics found settings_debug_log Enables debug logging for the application. May cause performance degradation since it logs everything. Debug Logging No tracks found No playlists found No artists found No albums found Swipe to refresh the list. There was an error while trying to load the playlists. Search and play a track Include Device & Application Information 

Device: %1$s %2$s Android(%3$s)
MusicBee Remote v%4$s Refresh Include Logs A newer version of the plugin is available.
Please consider updating. Plugin Update Required mbrc.settings.album_artist_only Play Now (Queue All) Play Now (Queue Artist) Play Now (Queue Album) Press here to sync Attempting to establish connection… Output Select Output Close Connection failed while attempting to retrieve the output devices. There was a problem while retrieving the output devices. "Sync completed successfully. %1$d genres(s), %2$d artist(s) %3$d album(s), %4$d tracks and %5$d playlist(s) are available." Library Sync State Library Sync Information Albums Genres Artists Tracks Playlists Covers The following metadata entries are currently available to MusicBee Remote: Radio There was an error while refreshing the radio stations The radio station has been queued successfully. The radio station could not be queued. No radio stations found It seems that you have connected to an older version of the plugin.

Some features will not function properly unless you update the plugin to %1$s. Plugin Update Required Update icon MusicBee Remote MusicBee Remote controls notification BottomNavigationActivity 00:00 / 00:00 Opens the volume dialog Could not find a service Could not queue the radio due to a network error Radio station list was refreshed successfully Empty list icon Playlist Refresh was successful Now playing list was refreshed successfully There was a problem refreshing the now playing list An icon that is displayed when the list is empty %1$s - %2$s mbrc__actions Add tracks to the queue Adding tracks to the queue Actions Notifications that are the result of user actions such as sync or queue Library Sync Library sync is in progress %1$d of %2$d genres %1$d of %2$d albums %1$d of %2$d artists %1$d of %2$d tracks %1$d of %2$d playlists %1$d of %2$d covers "Syncing %1$d of %2$d %3$s" Genres Artists Albums Tracks Playlists Covers mbrc://%1$s:%2$d Speaker Icon Clear Radio %1$s by %2$s Display only album artists Placeholder image for an empty list
